programme.title: Murder In
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A young captain on her first murder case attempts to take the reins from her semi-retired partner. French with English subtitles.

programme.desc: Elisabeth Richard investigates a mysterious poisoning death.

programme.title: Detective Montalbano
programme.sub-title: Detective Montalbano: A Delicate Matter (Sn 1 Ep 27)
programme.desc: Murder, betrayal, temptationâ€¦it's all in a day's work for Detective Montalbano. Montalbano investigates the murder of a well-loved 70-year-old prostitute, along with an accusation of molestation at an elementary school. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.desc: Don Matteo is a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to solve crimes. A 13-year-old boy takes refuge in the rectory after it becomes clear that he knows a dangerous secret. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Blood of the Vine
programme.sub-title: Blood of the Vine: Acute Crisis (Sn 5 Ep 7)
programme.desc: Benjamin Lebel is a renowned wine expert and a part-time sleuth whose intuition and nose are stimulated by puzzling murders. Benjamin stumbles upon an international wine scheme. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Captain Marleau
programme.sub-title: Captain Marleau: The Slave Tree (Sn 2 Ep 8)
programme.desc: Offbeat Captain Marleau solves crimes in her own, Columbo-style way. Marleau's sweet vacation in Guadaloupe gets interrupted when she's called to help the local police. French with English subtitles.

programme.desc: Lieutenant Bauer reconnects with her past as she investigates a death at an old potash mine.

programme.title: Murder In: Martigues (Sn 1 Ep 3)
programme.desc: Elisabeth and Paul team up again when a dead body is discovered on a beach in Martigues.
